mapper.sql: id, create_at, update_at, delete_at, operation_info, operation_picture, is_display, creater
mapper.select:
select
from homepage_banner where delete_at is null
and operation_info like CONCAT('%', #{operation_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and is_display like CONCAT('%', #{is_display,jdbcType=INTEGER}, '%')
order by create_at desc LIMIT #{start},#{end}

select count(1) from homepage_banner where delete_at is null
and operation_info like CONCAT('%', #{operation_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and is_display like CONCAT('%', #{is_display,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into homepage_banner (id, create_at, update_at, delete_at, operation_info, operation_picture, is_display, creater) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into homepage_banner
id,
create_at,
update_at,
delete_at,
operation_info,
operation_picture,
is_display,
creater,

update homepage_banner
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_at = #{deleteAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
operation_info = #{operationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operation_picture = #{operationPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_display = #{isDisplay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
